Package com.im.njams.sdk.configuration

Interface ConfigurationProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfigurationProvider, FileConfigurationProvider, MemoryConfigurationProvider
    public interface ConfigurationProvider
    This interface must be implemented for creating new ConfigurationProvider
    Author:
    pnientiedt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void configure​(Properties properties, Njams njams)
      Configure the new ConfigurationProvider via given Properties and the Njams object
      String getName()
      Should return the name by which the new ConfigurationProvider could be identified.
      String getPropertyPrefix()
      Returns the prefix for this ConfigurationProvider.
      default Set<String> getSecureProperties()
      Configuration providers store secrets, such as passwords, etc.
      Configuration loadConfiguration()
      This function should load the Configuration from the underlying storage of the new ConfigurationProvider.
      ProcessConfiguration newProcesConfiguration()
      Has to create a new ProcessConfiguration initialized with defaults.
      void saveConfiguration​(Configuration configuration)
      This function should save the Configuration to the underlying storage.
      default ConfigurationValidationResult validate()
      Is called when the ConfigurationProvider has been configured to ensure that the according Configuration is fully usable.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Should return the name by which the new ConfigurationProvider could be identified.
        Returns:
        name

      • configure

        void configure​(Properties properties,
               Njams njams)
        Configure the new ConfigurationProvider via given Properties and the Njams object
        Parameters:
        properties - Settings Properties
        njams - Njams instance

      • loadConfiguration

        Configuration loadConfiguration()
        This function should load the Configuration from the underlying storage of the new ConfigurationProvider. If the storage does not contain a Configuration, it should return a new empty Configuration
        Returns:
        Configuration

      • saveConfiguration

        void saveConfiguration​(Configuration configuration)
        This function should save the Configuration to the underlying storage.
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration to be saved

      • getPropertyPrefix

        String getPropertyPrefix()
        Returns the prefix for this ConfigurationProvider. Only properties starting with this prefix will be given to the ConfigurationProvider for initialization.
        Returns:
        the prefix

      • getSecureProperties

        default Set<String> getSecureProperties()
        Configuration providers store secrets, such as passwords, etc. They should return the name of any property here, that must not be printed to console or log files
        Returns:
        Collection of secure settings that must not be printed into the startup banner

      • newProcesConfiguration

        ProcessConfiguration newProcesConfiguration()
        Has to create a new ProcessConfiguration initialized with defaults.
        Returns:
        A new pre-initialized newProcesConfiguration()

      • validate

        default ConfigurationValidationResult validate()
        Is called when the ConfigurationProvider has been configured to ensure that the according Configuration is fully usable.
        Returns:
        Validation result. ConfigurationValidationResult.SUCCESS by default.
